name: Ninja Avenger Dragon Blade
description: Join the amazing adventure of Hayashi in an incredible ninja universe with legendary clans, ancient dragons, incredible ninja wars. Help our hero bring peace once again to these troubled mystical realms.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7/8/10 Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Graphics card or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3 2.5GHz or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Graphics card or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
